column4: if anyone knows.. i am planning on getting my drumkit mic'd and im going to need a system for an equalizer and recording setup with multiple channels, etc.. just wondering if there are open source tools that can deliver quality and a good system better than proprietary software for mac/windows.

yes, i've had a look at them.. like audacity and ardour 2.. they look nice.. but i cant really test it out to compare the quality of the tools. cause i dont have my equipment setup yet.. just wondering if anyone knows or has had experience using them.
I can't be of any help -- I just listen to music :)
